text: Lia Quartapelle (born 15 August 1982) is an Italian politician of the Democratic Party (PD). In 2013, she was elected as a Member of the Chamber of Deputies. Quartapelle was born in Varese, Italy. In 2020, she married former Justice Minister Claudio Martelli. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Lombardy Category:People from Varese
title: Lia Quartapelle
